# Castigate, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Fear Spells|fear]], [[Language-Dependent Spells|language-dependent]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Targets:** One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 round/level or 1 round; see text

**Saving Throw:** Will partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 210

This spell functions as *[[Castigate (Spell)|castigate]]*, except it affects many creatures.
